abilities.name: Death Blow
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Str +6 during combat.

abilities.name: Fiendish Blow
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Magic +6 during combat.

abilities.name: Darting Blow
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat, grants AS +6 during combat.

abilities.name: Armored Blow
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def +6 during combat.

abilities.name: Warding Blow
abilities.description: When user triggers the battle, grants Resistance +20

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.description: Allies within 1 space inflict +3 damage in combat.

abilities.name: Seal Strength
abilities.description: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Str -6 for 1 turn after combat.

abilities.name: Seal Defense
abilities.description: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Def -6 for 1 turn after combat.

abilities.name: Seal Resistance
abilities.description: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Res -6 for 1 turn after combat.

abilities.name: Seal Magic
abilities.description: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Mag -6 for 1 turn after combat.

abilities.name: Seal Movement
abilities.description: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Mov -1 for 1 turn after combat.

abilities.name: Heartseeker
abilities.description: If foes is within a 1-space radius, grants foes Avoid -20

abilities.name: Tomebreaker
abilities.description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 against magic users.

abilities.name: Bowbreaker
abilities.description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 against bow users.

abilities.name: Fistbreaker
abilities.description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 against brawlers.

abilities.name: Fire
abilities.description: Grants access to Fire. If unit has already learned Fire, mulitplies its uses per battle by 2x.

abilities.name: Miasma
abilities.description: Grants access to Miasma. If unit has already learned Miasma, mulitplies its uses per battle by 2x.

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description: Grants access to Heal. If unit has already learned Heal, multiplies its uses per battle by 2×.

abilities.name: Renewal
abilities.description: Unit recovers up to 20% of max HP at the start of each turn.

abilities.name: Poison Strike
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat and lands a hit, targeted foe loses up to 20% of max HP after combat.

abilities.name: Lifetaker
abilities.description: Unit recovers HP equal to 50% of damage dealt after defeating a foe.

abilities.name: Lethality
abilities.description: Chance to instantly kill a foe when dealing damage.

abilities.name: Poison
abilities.description: Chance to inflict poison on a foe when dealing damage.

abilities.name: Pavise
abilities.description: Chance to reduce sword/lance/axe/brawling damage by half.

abilities.name: Aegis
abilities.description: Chance to reduce bow/magic damage by half.

abilities.name: Miracle
abilities.description: Chance to survive lethal damage with 1 HP, if HP is > 1.

abilities.name: Terrain Resistance
abilities.description: Nullifies damage from terrain.

abilities.name: Special Dance
abilities.description: When using the Dance ability, grant Dex/Spd to target ally.

abilities.name: Vantage
abilities.description: If foe initiates combat, and if HP is ≤ 50%, unit still attacks first

abilities.name: Desperation
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 50%, unit’s follow-up attack (if possible) occurs before foe’s counterattack.

abilities.name: Quick Riposte
abilities.description: If Unit's HP ≥ 50%, if attacked by a foe, treats unit's Attack Speed as 4 higher than the foe's, granting the unit a follow up attack and denying the enemy's.

abilities.name: Wrath
abilities.description: If foe initiates combat while unit’s HP is ≤ 50%, grants Crit +50.

abilities.name: Dance
abilities.description: Use Dance to allow an ally to move again.

abilities.name: Steal
abilities.description: Allows unit to steal a non-weapon item form a foe with a lower Spd stat.

abilities.name: Locktouch
abilities.description: Allows the user to open normal doors and chests without keys

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: Enemies can't target the user if an ally not possessing stealth is in range.

abilities.name: Canto
abilities.description: After performing an action, user can user their leftover movement.

abilities.name: Pass
abilities.description: Move through enemy spaces.

abilities.name: Bowrange +1
abilities.description: Maximum Bow range +1

abilities.name: Bowrange +2
abilities.description: Maximum Bow range +2

abilities.description: Maximum anima magic range +1

abilities.description: Maximum dark magic range +1

abilities.description: Maximum light magic range +1

abilities.name: Unarmed Combat
abilities.description: User is able to fight barehandedly.

abilities.description: Multiplies the number of uses for anima magic by 2

abilities.name: Dark Magic Uses x2
abilities.description: Multiplies the number of uses for dark magic by 2

abilities.name: Light Magic Uses x2
abilities.description: Multiplies the number of uses for light magic by 2

abilities.name: Light Magic Heal +5
abilities.description: Adds 5 additional HP when healing with light magic.

abilities.name: Light Magic Heal +10
abilities.description: Adds 10 additional HP when healing with light magic.

abilities.name: Unsealable Magic
abilities.description: Prevents unit from being silenced.

abilities.name: Immune Status
abilities.description: Nullifies status effects and debuffs.

abilities.name: General
abilities.description: Nullifies instant death effects.

abilities.name: Commander
abilities.description: Nullifies instant death effects, status effects, and movement effects.

abilities.name: Infinite Magic
abilities.description: Removes the limitation on the number of times magic can be used.

abilities.name: Magic Bind
abilities.description: If the unit lands a hit, targeted foe is unable to use magic for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Infantry Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against infantry units.

abilities.name: Armored Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against armored units.

abilities.name: Cavalry Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against cavalry units.

abilities.name: Flying Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against flying units.

abilities.name: Dragon Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against dragons.

abilities.name: Monster Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against monsters.

abilities.name: Effect Null
abilities.description: Cancels all types of effectiveness.

abilities.name: Vital Defense
abilities.description: Makes critical hits against this unit impossible.

abilities.name: Giant Wings
abilities.description: Grants Avoid +30 against sword, lance, and axe users.

abilities.name: Anti-magic Armor
abilities.description: Nullifies damage from magical attacks.

abilities.name: Noncombatant
abilities.description: Unit cannot be targetted by foes.

abilities.name: Cursed Power
abilities.description: Unit recovers HP on swamp terrain.

abilities.name: Anchor
abilities.description: Prevents unit from being moved.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.description: Allows unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

abilities.name: Anima Magic Uses x4
abilities.description: Multiplies the number of uses for anima magic by 4

abilities.name: Dark Magic Uses x4
abilities.description: Multiplies the number of uses for dark magic by 4

abilities.name: Light Magic Uses x4
abilities.description: Multiplies the number of uses for light magic by 4

abilities.name: Alert Stance
abilities.description: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Avo +15 for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Alert Stance+
abilities.description: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Avo +30 for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Agarthan Technology
abilities.description: Adjacent foes deal 3 less damage during combat.

abilities.name: Lucky Seven
abilities.description: Each turn, grants +5 to one of the following stats: Str, Mag, Spd, Def, Res, Hit, or Avo.

abilities.name: Transmute
abilities.description: If unit is hit with a magic attack during enemy phase, grants +3 to all stats until next player phase ends.

abilities.name: Duelist's Blow
abilities.description: Grants Avoid +20 when user triggers battle.

abilities.name: Uncanny Blow
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Hit Rate +30 during combat.

abilities.name: Combat Medic
abilities.description: Unit's knowledge of anatomy grants Crit +10 in combat.

abilities.name: Try Your Best
abilities.description: Allies within 1 space are granted Str +3 and Def +3 during combat.

abilities.name: Hesitant Prodigy
abilities.description: Use can choose to increase the might of an attack by 4 at the cost of 4 HP

abilities.name: Hesitant Prodigy (Debuff)
abilities.description: If the user is within 1 space of an ally, attacks deal 4 less damage, but 4 more damage otherwise

abilities.name: Hesitant Prodigy (Buff)
abilities.description: If the user is within 1 space of an ally, attacks deal 4 less damage, but 4 more damage otherwise

abilities.name: Brittle Bones
abilities.description: Inflicts Def -2 and Res -2 when attacked, but grants +4 Spd,

abilities.name: Painless
abilities.description: When a non-adjacent enemy initiates combat, -4 damage taken.

abilities.name: Painless Conduit
abilities.description: Immune to status effects from enemy mana-wells, and takes half damage from mana-wells. While HP is below 50% and an enemy initiates combat with him, Nico takes -2 damage and gains 15 avoid.

abilities.name: Primed for Danger
abilities.description: While Clara is at 80% HP or above, she attacks first in combat.

abilities.name: Self Restraint
abilities.description: If this unit does not attack on player phase, on this unit's first combat of enemy phase, grants +4 damage dealt and -4 damage taken and any abilities that would activate "if unit initiates combat" activate.

abilities.name: Indirect Aggression
abilities.description: When this unit when heals an ally, that unit gains Str +4 and Mag +4 for one turn.

abilities.name: Blessed Fortitude
abilities.description: Healing effects on this unit are increased by +5

abilities.name: Defiant Protection
abilities.description: When user’s HP is <25%, use your highest stat between DEF and RES to reduce damage from all attacks, regardless of if physical or magical damage

modifiers.mdr: if def > res then 0 else res - def
modifiers.pdr: if res > def then 0 else def - res

abilities.name: Weight -3
abilities.description: The threshold to double this character is increased by 3.

abilities.name: Weight -5
abilities.description: The threshold to double this character is increased by 5.

abilities.name: Umbral Leech
abilities.description: Unit absorbs HP from phantoms.

abilities.name: Manifest Phantom
abilities.description: Unit births phantoms

abilities.name: Summon
abilities.description: Grants access to Summon. If unit has already learned Summon, mulitplies its uses per battle by 2x.

abilities.name: Bestowal
abilities.description: User's equipped abilities and combat arts, excluding personal and class abilities, are also equipped by any lesser phantom the user summons.

abilities.name: Invocation
abilities.description: Instead of moving normally, the user may choose to use their remaining movement to warp to a space adjacent to a phantom they have summoned. The user cannot warp to a space they would not normally be able to occupy.

abilities.name: Hide Piercer
abilities.description: Monster shields do not mitigate the unit’s damage.

abilities.name: Monster Wrangler
abilities.description: This unit gets +15% AVO against Monster attacks.

abilities.name: Monster Slayer
abilities.description: Monster shields do not mitigate the unit’s damage and this unit gets +15% AVO against Monster attacks.

abilities.name: Formation
abilities.description: Adjacent allied units take 3 less damage in combat.

abilities.name: Plot Armor
abilities.description: This unit is immune to critical hits but for a roll of 1.

abilities.name: Master Thief
abilities.description: Grants +1 skill proficiency or +1 skill expertise.

abilities.name: Immaterial
abilities.description: User's movement type is flight, but user does not take effective damage from being a flyer.

abilities.name: Infernal Chorus
abilities.description: Enables user to summon and control more than one phantom at once, however only one can still benefit from Bestowal.

abilities.name: Hero Complex
abilities.description: Increases Might of combat arts by +5 when targeted foe is in range to attack an ally.

abilities.name: Animal Affinity
abilities.description: Damage taken from mounted foes is reduced by 10 but so is damage done to mounted foes.

abilities.name: Near Miss
abilities.description: If attacking foes's attack roll is within 10 of its to hit, damage is reduced by 10 and the attack is not a critical hit.

abilities.name: Opportunist
abilities.description: Damage increases by 4 if this unit initiates combat and the foe cannot counterattack.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: At the start of every other turn, Unit and adjacent allies heal 10% of their Max HP. While Unit's HP => 50%, Unit and foe cannot make follow-up attacks during combat.

abilities.name: Blacksmith's Experience
abilities.description: Simdell doesn’t lose durability points on a combat art attack that misses, and his special weapons are granted +5 durability, +4 DEF when using a combat art

abilities.name: Reckless Charger
abilities.description: If Willifort moves at least 4 spaces on his turn, he may attack as if he had Darting Blow (+6 SPD). In addition, he gets +1 MOVE, but the additional space must be used to make an attack. Willifort cannot use Reckless Charger on the same target more than once in succession.

abilities.name: Agarthan Tactics
abilities.description: When this unit is attacked or attacks a unit with a different weapon type, foes deal 2 less damage and this unit deals 2 more damage and critical +10.

abilities.name: Spell Sink
abilities.description: This unit gains +5 resistance against spells, and spells cast on this unit have their uses reduced by twice the normal amount.

abilities.name: Undying Bloodlust
abilities.description: Triples maximum HP and grants immunity to critical hits, but unit treats all others as foes.

abilities.name: Chess Piece
abilities.description: This unit moves as though it were a chess piece. It is not removed from the board when defeated and may move after it is defeated, creating an obstruction until captured.

abilities.name: Mystical Bypass
abilities.description: This unit ignores magically created obstructions.

abilities.name: Other Prowess Lv 1
abilities.description: Grants Hit +6, Avo +6, and Crit Avo +5 when using a nonstandard weapon type.

abilities.name: Other Prowess Lv 2
abilities.description: Grants Hit +8, Avo +8, and Crit Avo +6 when using a nonstandard weapon type.

abilities.name: Other Prowess Lv 3
abilities.description: Grants Hit +10, Avo +10, and Crit Avo +7 when using a nonstandard weapon type.

abilities.name: Other Prowess Lv 4
abilities.description: Grants Hit +12, Avo +12, and Crit Avo +8 when using a nonstandard weapon type.

abilities.name: Other Prowess Lv 5
abilities.description: Grants Hit +15, Avo +15, and Crit Avo +10 when using a nonstandard weapon type.

abilities.name: Spectral Armor
abilities.description: Unit can only be dmaged after it has been hit by both a physical and magical based attack. A critical hit nullifies this effect and deals damage as normal.

abilities.name: Cold Tempered
abilities.description: Unit gains +4 to offensive and defensive when within three spaces of an ice wall.

abilities.name: Fear of Fire
abilities.description: Unit is penalized -4 to defensive stats and speed for one turn when hit with a fire attack.

abilities.name: Freak of Nature
abilities.description: Unit gains +4 to Defense and Resistance when within three spaces of monster, and monsters within three spaces of this unit gain monster resistance.

abilities.name: Ambush Predator
abilities.description: If unit takes the wait action, gains +15 Avoid and +10 Crit during enemy phase.

abilities.name: Wilder
abilities.description: Unit ignores movement penalty from difficult terrain.

abilities.name: Cheer/Enforce
abilities.description: Mounted, the unit can enforce allies with the vigor to finish the fight. Allies within 2 spaces gain +15 Hit/Crit Avo for 1 turn. Unmounted, the unit can cheer on one of their allies to continue fighting. The Unit can use Cheer to grant an adjacent ally another action, using their action. The Unit can use Cheer/Enforce 1 time for every 3 points of Cha this Unit has.

abilities.name: Inspiration
abilities.description: For every 4 points of Cha this Unit has, Allies within 2 spaces take -1 less damage and deal +1 more damage.

abilities.name: Light Shield Mastery
abilities.description: Unit ignores the negative effects of equpping shields with Prot <= 2.

abilities.name: Resourceful
abilities.description: Unit gains one additional use from consumable items.

abilities.name: Obstruct
abilities.description: While a foe is with in two spaces of this unit either vertically or horizontally, they can only move along that axis. If a foe is within two units' perpendicular obstruct areas they may choose to move along either axis. Units with the Pass ability ignore these restrictions.

abilities.name: Wander
abilities.description: Grants use of the Wander combat art.

weapons.name: Spider Ice
weapons.description: Inflicts -1 to Mov and -3 to Spd to foe for 1 turn. Deals magic-based damage. Cannot follow-up.

weapons.name: Devil Sword
weapons.description: Inflicts 10 damage to the wielder after combat.

weapons.name: Devil Sword+
weapons.description: Inflicts 10 damage to the wielder after combat.

weapons.name: Cursed Ashiya Sword
weapons.description: Deals 5 damage to user after combat.

weapons.name: Devil Lance
weapons.description: Inflicts 10 damage to the wielder after combat.

weapons.name: Devil Lance+
weapons.description: Inflicts 10 damage to the wielder after combat.

weapons.name: Saintslayer
weapons.description: The form given to a hateful curse against the Church of Seiros. Effective against those who bear a Crest of Chichol, Cethleann, Indech, Macuil, Aubin, Timotheos, Chevalier, Noa, Seiros, or Flames. Restores HP equal to 50% of damage dealt to a foe bearing one of these crests.

weapons.name: Devil Axe
weapons.description: Inflicts 10 damage to the wielder after combat.

weapons.name: Devil Axe+
weapons.description: Inflicts 10 damage to the wielder after combat.

weapons.name: Phase
weapons.description: Enchant a friendly unit to gain the “Pass” feature for one turn, allowing them to move through enemy occupied spaces. Also grants +10 Avoid to the target for one turn.

weapons.name: Hex
weapons.description: Curse an enemy unit within range of 5. Until the start of your next turn, the cursed unit must make attack rolls twice, taking the highest Hit result of the two.

weapons.name: Mire
weapons.description: Inflicts Def -5 to foe for 1 turn.

weapons.name: Swarm
weapons.description: Inflicts Spd -5 to foe for 1 turn.

weapons.name: Banshee
weapons.description: Inflicts reduced Mov to foe for 1 turn.

weapons.name: Confusion
weapons.description: Befuddle an enemy unit within range of 5. The unit must use all of its available movement to move in a randomly determined direction. Roll a 1d4. 1: up, 2: right, 3: down, 4: left.

weapons.name: Ethereal Weapon
weapons.description: Summons an Ethereal weapon for the duration of the battle or until the caster dies. If the wielder of the weapon dies, weapon returns to caster's inventory.

weapons.name: Enshroud
weapons.description: Grants Def +7 to the user; effect diminishes with each turn.

weapons.name: Luna
weapons.description: Ignores enemy’s Resistance; cannot trigger follow-up attacks.

weapons.name: Invisibility
weapons.description: Become untargetable until the start of your next turn. Still subject to area of effect attacks.

weapons.name: Summon
weapons.description: Summon a minor phantom at a level equivalent to the caster. See the Roll20 handout for detailed summoning rules.

weapons.name: Vesper
weapons.description: Inflicts Res -5 to foe for 1 turn.

weapons.name: Paradox
weapons.description: Inflicts -3 to Dex and Spd to foe for 1 turn. Cannot follow-up.

weapons.name: Severance
weapons.description: On hit, reduces unit's max by one half, cannot follow up or crit. Can be cured using Restore. Spell can only be earned by players through RP.

weapons.name: Bohr
weapons.description: Reduces foe’s HP to 1; cannot trigger follow-up attacks. Enemies only.

weapons.name: Quake
weapons.description: Damages all units except Flying; cannot trigger follow-up attacks. Enemies only.

weapons.name: Eurydice
weapons.description: Summon a major phantom from the dead. Enemies only. See the Roll20 handout for detailed summoning rules.

weapons.name: Ice Wall
weapons.description: Create adjacent blocks of ice that prevent movement. Creates one block per 5pts of magic. Cannot be cast on occupied tiles. Blocks may be destroyed by one attack. Lasts until destroyed or dispelled as a free action on the user’s turn

weapons.name: Frostbite
weapons.description: Inflicts Mov -1 to foe for 1 turn.

weapons.name: Fire Wall
weapons.description: Create adjacent patches of fire that damage units that start their turn there. Additional patches per 5pts of magic. Deals damage equal to ½ of Magic, minus enemy’s Resistance.

weapons.name: Wind Wall
weapons.description: Create adjacent torrents of wind. If cast on spaces with units in them, the caster may move the unit to an adjacent space. Ranged attacks cannot be made over wind tiles. It costs an extra point of movement to traverse wind tiles. Additional patches per 5pts of magic.

weapons.name: Lightning Wall
weapons.description: Create adjacent patches of lightning. The first time a unit enters a patch of lightning, it loses all remaining movement until the end of its turn. Additional patches per 5pts of magic. Deals damage equal to ½ Magic, minus enemy’s Resistance. Cannot be cast on occupied tiles.

weapons.name: Meteor
weapons.description: Magic that also hits targets adjacent to the point of impact. Cannot trigger follow-up attacks.

weapons.name: Niflheim
weapons.description: Magic that also hits targets adjacent to the point of impact. Inflicts Mov -1 to foes for 1 turn. Cannot trigger follow-up attacks.

weapons.name: Anima Wall
weapons.description: Create adjacent blocks of force that prevent movement. Creates one block per 5pts of magic. Cannot be cast on occupied tiles. Blocks have 50 hit points. Lasts until destroyed or dispelled as a free action on the user’s turn

weapons.name: Nosferatu
weapons.description: Restores HP equal to 50% of damage dealt to foe.

weapons.name: Bless
weapons.description: Bless a friendly unit within range of 5. Until the start of your next turn, the blessed unit makes attack rolls twice, taking the better hit result of the two.

weapons.name: Physic
weapons.description: Restores HP to a distant ally.

weapons.name: Guiding Bolt
weapons.description: On hit, attack rolls made against the target during its next combat have advantage. Cannot trigger follow-up attacks.

weapons.name: Restore
weapons.description: Cures status effects on all allies in range.

weapons.name: Ward
weapons.description: Grants Res +7 to an ally; effect diminishes with each turn.

weapons.name: Silence
weapons.description: Prevents foe from using magic for 1 turn.

weapons.name: Purge
weapons.description: Effective against units wielding dark magic. Enemy units only.

weapons.name: Rescue
weapons.description: Moves an ally to a space next to the user.

weapons.name: Warp
weapons.description: Moves an ally to a specified tile within range.

weapons.name: Sanctuary
weapons.description: Enchant a friendly unit. This unit can only be targeted by the enemy if an enemy unit has no other targets available to it.

weapons.name: Fortify
weapons.description: Restores HP for all allies in range.

weapons.name: Flame Strike
weapons.description: (PENDING APPROVAL) Magic that also hits targets within two spaces of the point of impact. Cannot trigger follow-up attacks.

weapons.name: Ethereal Spear (Opaque)
weapons.description: Can only be wielded using the Ethereal Weapon spell. Enables the use of the Hook combat art.

weapons.name: Ethereal Edge (Opaque)
weapons.description: Can only be wielded using the Ethereal Weapon spell. Enables the use of the Displaced Strike combat art.

weapons.name: Ethereal Lance (Opaque)
weapons.description: Can only be wielded using the Ethereal Weapon spell. Enables the use of the Displaced Strike combat art.

weapons.name: Ethereal Axe (Opaque)
weapons.description: Can only be wielded using the Ethereal Weapon spell. Enables the use of the Displaced Strike combat art.

weapons.name: Ethereal Spear (Translucent)
weapons.description: Can only be wielded using the Ethereal Weapon spell. Deals magic-based damage. Enables the use of the Hook combat art.

weapons.name: Ethereal Edge (Translucent)
weapons.description: Can only be wielded using the Ethereal Weapon spell. Deals magic-based damage. Enables the use of the Displaced Strike combat art.

weapons.name: Ethereal Lance (Translucent)
weapons.description: Can only be wielded using the Ethereal Weapon spell. Deals magic-based damage. Enables the use of the Displaced Strike combat art.

weapons.name: Ethereal Axe (Translucent)
weapons.description: Can only be wielded using the Ethereal Weapon spell. Deals magic-based damage. Enables the use of the Displaced Strike combat art.

weapons.name: Balthraz
weapons.description: Possesses a modified weapon triangle, and is strong against all magic and weak to Swords, Lances, and Axes except for its twin, Mistilaz. Sacred weapon (Crest of the Watcher) that restores HP every turn. (Effect increased with Crest.)

weapons.name: Mistilaz_
weapons.description: Possesses a modified weapon triangle, is strong against Swords, Lances, and Axes, except for its twin, Balthraz and weak to all magic. Deals magic-based damage. Sacred weapon (Crest of the Watcher) that restores HP every turn. (Effect increased with Crest.)

weapons.name: Mistilaz
weapons.description: Deals magic-based damage. Sacred weapon (Crest of the Noa) blood bonded to Rosalie Nedler. (Effect increased with Crest or if Rosalie Nedler.)

equipment.name: Aegis Shield
equipment.description: Relic shield. Prot +6 and Resl +3, may halve damage for Crest of Fraldarius

equipment.name: Ochain Shield
equipment.description: Sacred shield (Crest of Chichol). Prot +6, restores hp each turn and negates foe's critical hits.

equipment.name: Seiros Shield
equipment.description: Sacred shield (Crest of Seiros). Prot +5, restores hp each turn and halves damage from monsters.

equipment.name: Prayer Ring
equipment.description: Grants Miracle ability; restores HP each turn

equipment.name: Caduceus Staff
equipment.description: Sacred staff (Crest of Cethleann). Range +1 for offensive magic, restores hp each turn.

equipment.name: Asclepius
equipment.description: Grants +3 Protection, restores hp each turn.

equipment.name: Thyrsus
equipment.description: Relic staff (Crest of Gloucester). Range +2 for offensive magic, may halve damage received.

equipment.name: Rafail Gem
equipment.description: Relic gem (Crest of Lamine). Nullifies user’s class type weaknesses, prevents foe’s critical hits, and may halve damage received.

equipment.name: Fetters of Dromi
equipment.description: Relic ring (Crest of Aubin). Movement +1, user can continue moving after taking certain actions, and may halve damage received.

equipment.name: Tactiball Trophy
equipment.description: Cha +1, Avo +5. Enables the use of the Super Juke combat art.

equipment.name: Hematurgic Vessel
equipment.description: HP +5. When a unit is reduced to 0 HP by physical damage, stabilizes the unit, then permanently shatters.

combatarts.name: Standard Attack
combatarts.description: This is a combat art that represents not using a combat art. Serves as a template/placeholder

combatarts.name: Healing Focus
combatarts.description: Restores 50% of the user’s HP.

combatarts.name: Swap
combatarts.description: User swaps places with the ally.

combatarts.name: Shove
combatarts.description: User pushes ally forward 1 space.

combatarts.name: Reposition
combatarts.description: User moves ally to the space behind the user.

combatarts.name: Draw Back
combatarts.description: User moves 1 space backwards and ally is moved to where the user was previously.

combatarts.name: Smite
combatarts.description: User pushes ally forward 2 spaces.

combatarts.name: Wander
combatarts.description: Unit may move 2 additional spaces while ignoring movement penalties.

combatarts.name: Triangle Attack
combatarts.description: Can only be triggered when 3 allied Flying units (including the user) are adjacent to the same enemy.

combatarts.name: Foul Play
combatarts.description: Unit swaps positions with an ally in range. Exclusive to the Trickster class.

combatarts.name: Super Juke
combatarts.description: Tactiball Trophy only; Once per combat, +2 move for a turn.

combatarts.name: Sunder
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Wrath Strike
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Grounder
combatarts.description: Effective against Flying foes.

combatarts.name: Haze Slice
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Bane of Monsters
combatarts.description: Effective against Monster foes.

combatarts.name: Soulblade
combatarts.description: Deals magic-based damage. Might increases based on user’s Resistance

combatarts.name: Soulmonger
combatarts.description: Deals magic-based damage. Might increases based on user's Dexterity. Earned through RP.

combatarts.name: Flowing Blade
combatarts.description: Activate to adopt a flowing stance, granting the user +30% AVO until the start of their next turn. In addition, in the next combat at range 1, the user may counter attack twice, regardless of speed.

combatarts.name: Hexblade
combatarts.description: Deals magic-based damage.

combatarts.name: Finesse Blade
combatarts.description: Might increases based on user’s Dexterity.

combatarts.name: Windsweep
combatarts.description: Prevent enemy counter-attack.

combatarts.name: Subdue
combatarts.description: Leaves foe with at least 1 HP.

combatarts.name: Foudroyant Strike
combatarts.description: Thunderbrand only; effective against Armoured and Dragon foes.

combatarts.name: Beast Fang
combatarts.description: Blutgang only; effective against Cavalry and Dragon foes.

combatarts.name: Ruptured Heaven
combatarts.description: Sword of the Creator only; Might increases based on user’s Magic, effective against Dragon foes.

combatarts.name: Heaven’s Fall
combatarts.description: Dark Creator Sword only; Might increases based on user’s Magic.

combatarts.name: Assassinate
combatarts.description: Assassin only; Avoid +15, can kill enemies instantly.

combatarts.name: Astra
combatarts.description: Swordmaster only; triggers 5 consecutive hits at 30% Might.

combatarts.name: Sublime Heaven
combatarts.description: Sublime Creator Sword only; Might increases based on user’s Magic, effective against Dragon foes.

combatarts.name: Sword Dance
combatarts.description: Might increases based on user’s Charm.

combatarts.name: Tempest Lance
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Hit and Run
combatarts.description: After combat, user moves 1 space backwards.

combatarts.name: Knight Kneeler
combatarts.description: Effective against Cavalry foes.

combatarts.name: Shatter Slash
combatarts.description: After combat, inflicts Def -5 on foe for 1 turn.

combatarts.name: Vengeance
combatarts.description: Damage increases in relation to the user’s missing HP.

combatarts.name: Monster Piercer
combatarts.description: Effective against Monster foes.

combatarts.name: Frozen Lance
combatarts.description: Deals magic-based damage. Might increases based on user’s Dexterity.

combatarts.name: Hook
combatarts.description: On hit, draws the target one space closer to the user.

combatarts.name: Redirection
combatarts.description: Until start of user’s next turn, the user is granted +5 RES. If the user takes any spell damage, they may apply their next attack as Magic damage.

combatarts.name: Swift Strikes
combatarts.description: Triggers 2 consecutive hits.

combatarts.name: Lance Jab
combatarts.description: Might increases based on user’s Speed.

combatarts.name: Glowing Ember
combatarts.description: Might increases based on user’s Defence.

combatarts.name: Ruined Sky
combatarts.description: Lance of Ruin only; Avoid +10, effective against Flying and Dragon foes.

combatarts.name: Atrocity
combatarts.description: Areadbhar only; effective against all foes.

combatarts.name: Burning Quake
combatarts.description: Lúin only; Might increases based on user’s Speed, effective against Dragon foes.

combatarts.name: Paraselene
combatarts.description: Great Lord only; After combat, user moves 1 space backwards.

combatarts.name: Smash
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Spike
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Helm Splitter
combatarts.description: Effective against Armoured foes.

combatarts.name: Focused Strike
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Wild Abandon
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Lightning Axe
combatarts.description: Deals magic-based damage. Might increases based on user’s Resistance.

combatarts.name: Monster Breaker
combatarts.description: Effective against Monster foes.

combatarts.name: Shield Axe
combatarts.description: The user makes a skilled attack while also using the broadside of the axe as a shield. The user is granted temporary HP equal to half of damage inflicted by this attack until the start of next turn.

combatarts.name: Armored Strike
combatarts.description: Might increases based on user’s Defence.

combatarts.name: Diamond Axe
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Exhaustive Strike
combatarts.description: One use.

combatarts.name: Nedler's Amputator
combatarts.description: Deals magic-based damage. Might increases based on user’s Speed

combatarts.name: Apocalyptic Flame
combatarts.description: Freikugel only; inflicts Str -5 on foe for 1 turn, effective against Dragon foes.

combatarts.name: Dust
combatarts.description: Crusher only; inflicts Def -5 on foe for 1 turn, effective against Dragon foes.

combatarts.name: Raging Storm
combatarts.description: Aymr only; if attack lands, user can move again, effective against Dragon foes.

combatarts.name: Flickering Flower
combatarts.description: Emperor only; prevents foe from moving for 1 turn.

combatarts.name: War Hero’s Strike
combatarts.description: War Hero only; effective against all foes.

combatarts.name: Curved Shot
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Monster Blaster
combatarts.description: Effective against Monster foes.

combatarts.name: Deadeye
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Waning Shot
combatarts.description: After combat, inflicts Str -5 on foe for 1 turn.

combatarts.name: Break Shot
combatarts.description: After combat, inflicts Def -5 on foe for 1 turn.

combatarts.name: Schism Shot
combatarts.description: After combat, inflicts Res -5 on foe for 1 turn.

combatarts.name: Heavy Draw
combatarts.description: No special effect.

combatarts.name: Covering Fire
combatarts.description: Activate to adopt a stance providing suppressive fire. A friendly target within attack range of equipped bow is granted +5 DEF and RES against ranged attacks. In addition, the user may counter-attack units who attack the covered friendly target with ranged attacks, regardless of range. The user and the covered unit cannot both counter attack if they can, but must choose one to counter attack.

combatarts.name: Point-Blank Volley
combatarts.description: Triggers 2 consecutive hits.

combatarts.name: Encloser
combatarts.description: Prevents foe from moving for 1 turn.

combatarts.name: Ward Arrow
combatarts.description: Prevents foe from using magic for 1 turn.

combatarts.name: Fallen Star
combatarts.description: Failnaught only; avoids all attacks during the next round of combat; effective against Dragon foes.

combatarts.name: Hunter’s Volley
combatarts.description: Sniper only; triggers 2 consecutive hits.

combatarts.name: Wind God
combatarts.description: Barbarossa only.

combatarts.name: Conduit of Faith
combatarts.description: Deals magic-based damage. Expends a usage of a Light Magic spell and adds its might to the attack and 1/3 of its might to the cost.

combatarts.name: Displaced Strike
combatarts.description: Only usable with ethereal weapons.

combatarts.name: Inspiration of Awe
combatarts.description: Something that need not be seen.

combatarts.name: Taunt
combatarts.description: Choose an enemy within five spaces; during the next player phase, if that enemy attacks a unit other than the user, it suffers -30 hit during that combat.

combatarts.name: Save from Weapons
combatarts.description: +5 DEF; Choose one allied unit within two spaces, whenever that unit is targeted by an attack that calculates damage using Strength, you enter combat instead of them, as if you were in their space.

combatarts.name: Save from Magic
combatarts.description: +5 RES; Choose one allied unit within two spaces, whenever the unit is targeted by an attack that calculates damage using Magic, you enter combat instead of them, as if you were in their space.

combatarts.name: Shelter F
combatarts.description: While mounted, choose an allied Infantry or Armored unit in an adjacent space; that unit enters into the user's space and moves along with the user while the user is mounted. A unit that is sheltered cannot use or be target by attacks, spells, or combat arts. At any point during the player phase, the sheltered unit can choose to leave the shelter and use all of their remaining movement to enter into an adjacent space. If a unit reduced to zero hitpoints while sheltering another unit, that sheltered unit then occupies the space previously occupied by the sheltering unit.

combatarts.name: Shelter R
combatarts.description: While mounted, choose an allied Infantry or Armored unit in an adjacent space; that unit enters into the user's space and moves along with the user while the user is mounted. A unit that is sheltered cannot use or be target by attacks, spells, or combat arts. At any point during the player phase, the sheltered unit can choose to leave the shelter and use all of their remaining movement to enter into an adjacent space. If a unit reduced to zero hitpoints while sheltering another unit, that sheltered unit then occupies the space previously occupied by the sheltering unit.
